communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as "hacks"; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I've always been about self discipline and control, and for me, that means being mindful of what I eat and when. It's not about deprivation, it's about being in charge of my body.
narratives.p_intro: Hey guys, just wanted to share some tips that have worked for me on my fitness journey. Fasting and calorie restriction can be tough, but with the right mindset, you can achieve anything!
